altTitles.ko: 전생 콜로세움 ～최약 스킬로 최강의 여자들을 공략해 노예 할렘 만듭니다～

altTitles.ja: 転コロ

description.en: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
description.es:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Kouji Mikagami, memiliki nilai pelajaran biasa dan kemampuan atletik biasa, tapi "dia tidak banyak kalah" dalam bermain game, entah kenapa saat bermain game dia tiba-tiba dipanggil ke dunia lain. Sebuah cerita yang dimulai dengan apa yang terjadi. Meskipun mengkonsumsi 1.000 batu ajaib tingkat tinggi untuk melakukan pemanggilan, fakta bahwa ia hanya memiliki "Skill Copy" kemampuan terlemah membuat marah pendeta, dan akhirnya Mikagami dijadikan budak gladiator di Colosseum. Mikagami yang kesal dengan situasi yang tiba-tiba menyadari bahwa situasinya seperti dalam game, dan dengan kemampuan terlemahnya dia akan membuat budak harem di dunia lain.
description.es-la:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.

title.en: A Strange But Effective Villainess Life

description.en:
Kiana Frellai, the youngest granddaughter of the prestigious Frellai duchy and a genius magic engineering Ph.D., spends seven years secluded in research after fleeing her chaotic family.  

Suddenly dragged back to the empire, she learns her grandfather is accused of treason. Facing execution, her cousin Melissa's divine power rewinds time.  

Determined to prevent her family’s downfall, Kiana devises a plan, blending her genius strategies to rewrite the future.  

Armed with coffee and brains, she embarks on a project to save her family in the most unconventional way!

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.ja: 白物語

description.en: A few days prior, mysterious disappearances had occurred in a certain karaoke parlor. There, part-timer Aoki Tokiya was involved in an even stranger incident. On the other hand, Midorima, who is investigating the incident, could not seem to pinpoint the target’s true identity.
description.ja: 想いが象（かたち）になるとき、世界が開かれる！九十九師VS妖怪、開戦！失踪事件が起こったカラオケ店。そこでバイトする青木時也はさらなる奇怪な事件に巻きこまれていく。事件の調査にやってきた九十九師・緑間の導きで九十九師となった時也は、緑間とともに物ノ怪と応戦する。だが、100人目の九十九師の誕生は九十九師全員のパワーバランスを崩し、時也は「禁忌の存在」として命を狙われてしまう！

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

description.en:
The fifth official Touhou manga (and the first webcomic) written by ZUN and originally drawn by Ginmokusei. 

Touhou Chireikiden focuses on Satori Komeiji's endeavors as a detective, solving mysteries around Gensokyo.

*Serialization was paused for a few months after volume 2 was finished due to the health concerns of the original artist Ginmokusei. The series resumed serialization with Yuu Akimaki as the new artist.*

- **Links:**
[Manga on NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44569)
[Touhou Web Blog](https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/)

- **New serialisation:**
[Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0BQ5KZHYV)
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/356764/list/)
[EbookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/701436/)
description.vi:
Manga chính thức thứ 5 của Touhou, kịch bản được viết bởi ZUN và được minh họa bởi Ginmonkusei (Sau này được đổi thành Akimaki Yuu vì sức khỏe của Ginmonkusei có vấn đề) 

Bộ truyện tập trung vào Satori Komeji, một yêu quái có khả năng đọc tâm trí người khác, cô bắt đầu trở thành thám tử và đi giải quyết các vụ án ở khắp Ảo Tưởng Hương.
description.es-la:
Cada vez que en Gensokyo se produce un incidente en el que está involucrado un youkai, la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei suele resolver la situación confrontando al culpable. Sin embargo, los casos en los que los culpables ocultan su identidad suelen ser demasiado complejos como para que la exterminadora de youkais se encargue de ello.

Entra en escena Satori Komeiji. Como youkai satori, posee un tercer ojo que le permite leer las mentes, detectando a cualquier criminal sin importar las mentiras que pueda inventarse. Con su extraordinaria aptitud como detective, Satori es capaz de resolver todos los misterios que se le plantea, aunque no siempre quiera salir de su mansión.
description.pt-br:
Touhou Chireikiden é a primeira webcomic oficial da série Touhou Project, escrita por ZUN com ilustrações da novata Ginmokusei, apresentando Satori Komeiji como a mestra detetive das profundezas da Terra.

Pode ser lido em japonês gratuitamente no web blog oficial: https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/

description.en: Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

altTitles.ja: 亜人シェアハウス

description.en:
The communicative, corporate animal Kei Sato applies to move into a share house in order to make friends with whom he can have casual conversations. The three people there were Chiyuki Himiiyama (Snow Woman), Meme Janome (Medusa) and Melodrama Incuria (Incubus). This was a share house exclusively for subhumans, who were supposed to be invisible to humans...

The share house life begins with a lot of difficulties ahead!

(Source: Mangaupdates)

title.en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~

altTitles.ja: 転生したら才能があった件～異世界行っても努力する～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated With Talent: I'll Work Hard Even If I Go to Another World

description.en:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
description.ja: いくら努力しても報われない浪人生は、コンビニの女性店員とともに強盗を捕縛しようとした瞬間、異世界に転生することになってしまった。神様に“努力をしたらしただけ恵まれる才能”を望むんだところ、レベルアップに人より3倍の経験値が必要だが、確実に人より成長できる【天賦】と他者や物を鑑定できる【天眼】のスキルをもらうことになった。準男爵家の次男・マルスとして転生し、努力を重ねてステータスを伸ばしていたが、街の近くで魔物が溢れるスタンピードの前兆が見られて……。異世界転生努力ファンタジー、ここに開幕！

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Become a Shrine Maiden for Books!"
Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Even Join the Temple to Read Books!"

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第二部 「本のためなら巫女になる！」

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

altTitles.th: การปฏิวัติของสาวน้อยหนอนหนังสือ ภาค 2

altTitles.vi: Cuộc nổi dậy của nàng mọt sách ~Để trở thành thủ thư, tôi sẽ làm mọi cách~ Phần 2: Vì sách, tôi trở thành nữ tu!

description.en:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

altTitles.ja: 無頼な風 鉄

description.en:
Jockey Tetsu is a man who lives by his own style. One day, he is charmed by a certain horse and follows it to the end. What Tetsu finds is a runaway horse on the verge of being killed by poison.

---
* Includes three-chapter story "Samba Never Learns" in the same volume.

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: ＧＥ～グッドエンディング～

description.en:
Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is.

- Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)

altTitles.ja: ラブハグセラピー

description.en: Finally living alone as long as I've wanted! ... but university student Akizuki has started sharing a room with helis friend Hayase. As soon as slhe moves in, he is bewildered by Hayase, who says he can't imagine life without hugs, but for some reason he ends up hugging him every day...? And if he forgets his duty or doesn't hug him, he has to pay a fine and do whatever he tells him...? Akizuki is gradually getting used to the skinship with Hayase, but...?

altTitles.th: บันทึกตำนานอัศดงคต

description.en: The original journey to the west to retrieve the Sutra was a conspiracy plotted by the Heavens! Just after a few decades, the Sutra has vanished. The Heavens search for the Sutra with plans to use it with corrupted intentions. In order for the Sutra to not fall into the hands of Heaven, the journey to the west will begin once again.
A bespectacled pervert girl named Ling Yun discovered the domineering side of the seemingly weak and handsome Bai Ze. Thus, everyday was spent catching demons it was full of fear and welfare!

altTitles.ja: ダークサモナーとデキている

altTitles.zh: 黑暗召唤师在地下恋爱中

altTitles.zh-ro: Hēi'àn zhàohuàn shī zài dìxià liàn'ài zhōng

altTitles.ja: I'm dating a Dark Summoner

altTitles.vi: Hẹn hò cùng hắc thuật sư

description.en: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!
description.ja: クソ真面目な神官・ロニのパーティに新しく加入してきたのは、悪魔の力を使うダークサモナーで亜人のアモナ。反発し合い犬猿の仲になると思われた二人だったが、なんとパーティ加入初日に朝チュンしてしまい…！？

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

altTitles.my: ច្បាប់នៃអភូតហេតុ

description.en:
Ryan was an average human being. During an accidental event he received a power called "Blessing" Since then, his view of the world has radically changed. It has been a great shock to him.  
He pursues dreams of justice, confronting the reality of his world in this Shounen fantasy. That is where this manhua will transport you. A new world of danger, action, and fantasy!

title.en: Saikai Shita Osananajimi ga Watashi o Suki da Nante Kiitenai!

altTitles.ja: 再会した幼馴染が私を好きだなんて聞いてない!

altTitles.en: I Never Heard That My Childhood Friend, Whom I Reunited With, Likes Me!

description.en: Nao, a first-year university student, is quietly enjoying her campus life. The school is buzzing with talk about her handsome classmate and model, “Sho,” but she assumes such a glamorous world has nothing to do with her plain self. However, to her surprise, her crybaby and clumsy childhood friend turns out to be “Sho”! Not only that, but they suddenly start living together in secret from everyone…?! A love story between two people who can’t be honest with their feelings begins to unfold after their reunion.

description.vi: Tiếp tục là manga của D4DJ về Peaky P-key, unit đỉnh nhất của học viện Yoba còn gọi là nhà vô địch tuyệt đối. Sáng tác bởi Ichiro Sakaki, minh họa bởi Mitsuki Meia, manga kể về màn gặp gỡ giữa Kyoko và Shinobu, và sự hình thành của Peaky P-key với sự tham gia của Yuka và Esora.

description.en: In a land where there is no magic, a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey, a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?

altTitles.ja: MFゴースト

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

altTitles.en: The Song of Sand and Seas

description.en: She is a girl that everyone loves but she cannot speak of the love she has for her brother because her brother already loves someone else. In despair, she gets dragged into Ancient Egypt by a snake shaped bracelet that is engraved with a three thousand year old love oath. There, she meets the Pharoah's heir, a party boy….

Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

altTitles.ja: ずっと好きだったあなたが…。

altTitles.vi: Bạn, người tôi đã luôn yêu...

description.en:
I was rejected for not being good at my job. So, how much work should I do to—?
A twisted romance of a workaholic man, drawn by Nikumaru, the artist of *Aitsu no Kanojo* and *Bad Girl*!!

Published in *Young Magazine xxx*.
description.vi:
Tôi đã bị tiền bối từ chối vì không làm tốt trong công việc. Vậy thì tôi phải nỗ lực làm việc đến mức nào đây?
Câu chuyện tình yêu lệch lạc của một chàng trai nghiện công việc, được vẽ bởi Nikimaru, tác giả của Aitsu no Kanojo và Bad Girl!!

description.en: After nine college students are trapped under a collapsed building for 14 days, only six come out alive, and only four of them can speak. The dead bodies of their fellow students are viciously mangled, leading police to investigate the case as a possible homicide. Detective Lieutenants Jeongdo Kwon and Yeongchae Shin, together with renowned neuropsychiatrist Dr. Yeongwha Ju, must parse through witness testimony and inconclusive physical evidence to uncover the truth. But how do you solve a locked-room murder case when every witness is a suspect?

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

description.en:
Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan.
___
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
description.ja: 時は西暦1600年。“織田信長”が全国統一してから10年が経過していた――。信長は自分の死期を悟ると、最強の武芸者を輩出したものに“この国”を譲ると発表。天下統一の夢破れた武将たちは、それぞれ最強の武芸者を擁立し、この国の王を目指す！
description.vi:
Một câu chuyện với một chuỗi lịch sử hoàn toàn lạ lẫm với lịch sử mà chúng ta đã và đang từng được biết.
Oda Nobugana, sau khi hoàn thành đại nghiệp thống nhất thiên hạ, nay chỉ vì muốn nhìn thấy cảnh chém giết đổ máu, đã lập nên một giải đấu nhằm chọn ra người sẽ thay mình trị vì cả thiên hạ, "TENKAICHI". Để tham gia, những văn võ bá quan lẫn các trung thần đều sẽ chọn ra cho mình một võ sĩ đại diện, người mà họ cho rằng sẽ là thiên hạ đệ nhất võ sĩ tham gia thi đấu cho mình. Một đại hội đẫm máu và tàn khốc chưa từng có trong lịch sử Nhật Bản chính thức bắt đầu.
description.es-la: Torneo de batalla ambientado en la Era Sengoku. Es el año 1600. Han pasado diez años desde que Oda Nobunaga unificó Japón. Cuando Nobunaga se dio cuenta de que se estaba muriendo, anunció que entregaría el país a quien produjera los guerreros más fuertes. Los señores de la guerra, cuyos sueños de unificar el país se habían visto frustrados, crearon sus propios guerreros más fuertes y pusieron sus miras en convertirse en el gobernante de Japón
description.pt-br: “Quem é o artista marcial mais forte do Japão?” É 1600 D.C., dez anos se passaram desde que "Oda Nobunaga" unificou todo o país. Percebendo sua morte, Nobunaga anuncia que entregará 'este país' àquele que tivesse como seguidor o artista marcial mais forte.

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

altTitles.ja: 日替わり尻尾の尾崎ちゃん

description.en: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
description.ja: 毎日尻尾が生え変わる女子高生、尾崎詩穂（おざきしほ）。彼女の誘いで毎日のように体育倉庫を訪れる先輩は、今日も尻尾で、耳で、なすがままにされてしまう。

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.

description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

description.en:
Rachel was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her.

Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start… only to find herself three years in the past — with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed!

Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her—?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)
description.id:
Rachel dipilih sebagai tunangan putra mahkota hanya karena kekuatan sihir besar yang dimilikinya, Lalu, ketika sang santa muncul, dia takut kalau posisinya sebagai tunangan akan direbut darinya. 
Akhirnya, karena terbakar api cemburu, Rachel melakukan tindakan jahat kepada sang santa yang mengakibatkan tunangannya dibatalkan.
Kemudian setelah itu dia dihukum dengan dikirim ke kuil terpencil, tapi pada saat perjalanan, kendaraannya diserang oleh sekawanan bandit. 
Sesaat dia berpikir kalau kematiannya tidak akan bisa dihindari, dia ternyata telah terbangun dari tidurnya dan menyadari kalau dirinya telah kembali 3 tahun lalu bersamaan dengan menghilangnya kekuatan sihirnya.
Karena diberi kesempatan untuk mengulangi kembali kehidupannya, Rachel memutuskan memanfaatkan kesempatan ini untuk segera membatalkan pertunangannya sendiri.
Akan tetapi tidak disangka-sangka, sang putra mahkota malah menolak pembatalan pertunangannya, kira-kira kenapa ya?
description.ja:
魔力の高さから王太子の婚約者となるも、聖女の出現によりその座を奪われることを恐れたラシェル。
聖女に悪逆非道な行いをしたことで婚約破棄されて修道院送りとなり、
修道院へ向かう道中で賊に襲われて殺されてしまう。

死んだと思ったラシェルが目覚めると、なぜか3年前に戻っていたが
ほとんどの魔力を失い、ベッドから起き上がれないほどの病弱な体になってしまった。

今度は周りの人も自分も幸せな未来をつかむため、
これ幸いと今度はこちらから王太子との婚約を破棄しようとするが、
なぜか王太子が婚約破棄を拒否してきて!?
しかも魔力を失ったと思っていたのに、世界初の闇の精霊が私のもとへ!?

悪役令嬢が精霊と共に未来を変える異世界ハッピーファンタジー！
電子限定描き下ろし特典付き！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)

title.en: Kyouran Reijou Nia Liston: Byoujaku Reijou ni Tensei Shita Kamigoroshi no Bujin no Karei Naru Musouroku

altTitles.ja: 凶乱令嬢ニア・リストン 病弱令嬢に転生した神殺しの武人の華麗なる無双録

altTitles.vi: Cuồng loạn lệnh nương - Nia Liston

description.en:
"I wanted to die fighting anyway."

The great hero, who once even killed a god, wanted to fight even in death. What awaited her was her reincarnation as a sickly noblewoman. In the future world, she becomes the beautiful but too weak Daughter Nia Liston, but in her second life, she goes on a rampage in battle, in delivery activities and in academy life!

This is a record of the brilliant battles of the hero who will eventually be known as the "Wicked Rampant Daughter". The most powerful Warriors' Daughter presents the start of a painful otherworldly entertainment!
description.ja: 「どうせなら、戦って死にたかった」かつて神殺しをも成し遂げた大英雄は、死の間際でさえ戦いを望んでいた。そんな彼女を待ち受けていたのは、病弱な貴族令嬢への転生で――。未来の世界で美しくも弱すぎる令嬢ニア・リストンとなった彼女だったが、第二の人生では戦いでも、配信活動でも、学院生活でも大暴れ!?これは、いずれ「凶乱令嬢」と呼ばれる英雄の、華麗なる戦いの記録。

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.en: My Robot Maid Can't Be This Adorable

altTitles.ja: 機械じかけのマリー

description.en:
Marie gets hired to be a maid. But not just any maid… A robot maid!? How will she get through her new life pretending to be an emotionless mechanical maid? A manga full of comedy and romance!  
  
Starts with a one-shot, and has been officially serialized in LaLa magazine.

title.en: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Jiù Xiǎng Cèng Nǐ De Qì Yùn

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Freeload on Your Luck

description.en: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"
description.zh: 重生后的赵明溪为了避开绝症活下去，不得不去蹭傅氏太子爷身上的气运。 这位太子爷每次看到她，明明耳朵快红得滴血，还要装出酷炫狂霸拽的样子：“你能不能别缠我？” 第二天赵明溪就真的去找别人蹭气运了。:) 小狼狗头低了下来，委委屈屈：“给你缠还不行吗？”

altTitles.ja: 魔性の乙女の役廻り

altTitles.en: The Role of the Femme Fatale

description.en: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
description.ja: 私立廻蘭女学院中学。そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。この学校には古くから、生徒たちへ個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えるという特殊な制度があった。心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に入学すると、いきなりとんでもない課題を与えられてしまい――！？クセ強めなクラスメイトたちに囲まれて「愛人作り」はできるのか！？
